metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8972 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - negligible.
metadata.Description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the ValidateMove function in frontend/move.cc in GNU Chess (aka gnuchess) before 6.2.4 might allow context-dependent attackers to execute arbitrary code via a large input, as demonstrated when in UCI mode.

criterions.comment: gnuchess package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.2.5-1').
